cab.content: vjesteen front.(a) French Front. The French continue to gain ground North East of CHATEAU THIERRY and their line now runs as follows in this neighbourhood:-- CHARTEVES - South of LA CENSE A DIEU - EPIEDS - le CHAKME - thence no change. On the MARNE the French attempts to cross the river last night met with strong resistance. The French however occupied CHASSINS and PASSY (where a bridge has been constructed) on the Northern ban!?: of the MARNE. Between the MARNE and REIMS the situation is unchanged. It is reported that the Germans have set on fire village South of FEpe- en-taREENOis.W British Front * The situation is unchanged. I2 * ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS *-There is nothing to report.Fop the personal information of the Minister1 only. -General Staff,War Office, S.W.I.Issued at 6.20 p .m. 82nd July, 1918
